articles.title: Am I immune to COVID-19 if I have antibodies? - The Conversation US
articles.description: If you have had COVID-19 already, are you protected from another bout of the illness? And is the presence of antibodies in your blood a guarantee of immunity?
articles.content: Perhaps the most important question now about COVID-19 is the degree to which a prior infection protects from a second infection by the new coronavirus. This affects vaccine development and herd immu… [+4836 chars]
